abstract: Greg Grandin reviews book Our Man in Charleston: Britain’s Secret Agent in the Civil War South by Christopher Dickey.
lead_paragraph: A diplomat stationed in South Carolina helped keep Britain out of America’s Civil War.

headline.main: ‘Our Man in Charleston,’ by Christopher Dickey

snippet: A diplomat stationed in South Carolina helped keep Britain out of America’s Civil War.
